Languages.Language 1: Understands Common and Elvish but can not speak

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Gore, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Talons, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 8 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Peryton makes 1 Gore attack and 1 Talon attack

Abilities.Ability 1: Dive Attack, If the Peryton is flying and dives at a target and then hits with a Melee Weapon attack, the attack deals an extra Average 9 damage
Abilities.Ability 2: Flyby, The Peryton does not provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach
Abilities.Ability 3: Keen Sight and Smell, The Peryton has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell
